item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】FLAC - (2025) Deftones - private music [16bit 44.1kHz TIDAL Rip]
item.description:
Hot off the presses! Thank you international releases for releasing everything at midnight local. For me, this album shouldn't be out for many more hours, but I was able to do some VPN trickery and get a rip going. I've already got it ripped, tidied up with ReplayGain in the metadata, and I have all the lyric files synchronized in .lrc files ready to go just like all my other uploads!

private music is the newest album from Deftones, set to release internationally on August 22, 2025. It's got a lot of vibes from their past best hits.
